p: The bioclimatic variables for the future scenarios were from the IPCC Fourth Assessment Report (available from the International Centre for Tropical Agriculture: http://ccafs-climate.org). This method assumes changes in climates only over large distances and the relationships between variables are maintained from the present towards the future (see http://ccafs-climate.org/ for more details).
